statements: DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE observer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE location = 'Forest' AND observer_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_date = '2022-01-15' AND species = 'Bear';
DELETE FROM ecotourism_excursions WHERE guide_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE id = 100 AND species_name = 'Tiger';
DELETE FROM ecotourism_excursions WHERE guide_name = 'John Doe' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM wildlife_sightings WHERE sighting_id = 10 AND species_name = 'Elephant';
DELETE FROM eco_tourists WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM species WHERE scientific_name = 'Canis lupus';
